actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to provide additional penalties for fraud and related activities in connection with access devices and computers, and for other purposes.
short_title: Counterfeit Access Device and Computer Fraud and Abuse Act of 1985

summary.text: Counterfeit Access Device and Computer Fraud and Abuse Act of 1985 - Amends the Federal criminal code to provide penalties for any person who accesses a computer without authorization or with authorization for purposes to which such authorization does not extend and either obtains anything or causes a loss of a value aggregating $5,000. Establishes penalties for knowingly accessing a computer with the intent to defraud and by such conduct obtaining anything of value aggregating $5,000.

titles.title: Counterfeit Access Device and Computer Fraud and Abuse Act of 1985
A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to provide additional penalties for fraud and related activities in connection with access devices and computers, and for other purposes.
